sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都含"决定"之意。
means: decide ： 侧重指经过思考、比较、讨论或询问之后做出的决定。
determine ： 指经过深思熟虑，决心去做某事并坚持施行。
resolve ： 语气较强，强调以坚定不移的信念去做或不做某事，暗含有远大抱负和坚强决心。
settle ： 指排除犹豫、怀疑和争论之后作出明确的最终结论。

sentence.Network_en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentence.Network_cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

sentence.Network_en: A debriefing would follow this operation, to determine where it went wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次行动之后将会有一个任务执行情况报告会，以便确定是哪里出了问题。

sentence.Network_en: An astronomer can determine the brightness of each star.
sentence.Network_cn: 天文学家能够测定每颗恒星的亮度。

PROLOG教程-2（转载） - 韩非子的日志 - 网易博客 ... verbphrase:（ 动词短语） determiner:（ 限定词） noun:（ 名词）.

妇产科医学名词-词汇翻译 ... 雌激素撤退试验 estrogen withdral test 测定 determination 测量 measurment.
决定论（determinism）是所有学科研究的出发点。进行任何科学研究之前都必须首先假设，宇宙事物之间有一定的规律或法则可循。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French determiner, from Latin determinare 'limit, fix', from de- 'completely' + terminare 'terminate'

entry.def: If a particular factor determines the nature of a thing or event, it causes it to be of a particular kind.

example.ex: The size of the chicken pieces will determine the cooking time...
example.tran: 鸡块的大小将决定烹饪时间的长短。

example.ex: Social status is largely determined by the occupation of the main breadwinner...
example.tran: 社会地位很大程度上是由家里经济支柱的职业决定的。

entry.def: To determine a fact means to discover it as a result of investigation.

example.ex: The investigation will determine what really happened...
example.tran: 调查会查明到底发生了什么事情。

example.ex: Testing needs to be done to determine the long-term effects on humans...
example.tran: 需要进行检测以确定其对人的长期影响。

entry.def: If you determine something, you decide it or settle it.

example.ex: The Baltic people have a right to determine their own future...
example.tran: 波罗的海各国人民有权决定自己的未来。

example.ex: The final wording had not yet been determined...

entry.def: If you determine to do something, you make a firm decision to do it.

example.ex: He determined to rescue his two countrymen...
example.tran: 他决意营救自己的两名同胞。

example.ex: I determined that I would ask him outright.
example.tran: 我下定决心要直截了当地问他。

means.word_mean: 1. after a calculation, investigation, experiment, survey, or study;

sentences.sentence: "The physicist who found the elusive particle won the Nobel Prize"

means.word_mean: 2. shape or influence; give direction to;
5. reach, make, or come to a decision about something;
6. fix in scope; fix the boundaries of; the tree determines the border of the property
8. find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort;

sentences.sentence: "I want to see whether she speaks French"
"Check whether the train leaves on time"

auth_sentence.content: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.
auth_sentence.res_content: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.

auth_sentence.content: Events will determine whether he is right or wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: Events will determine whether he is right or wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Events will determine whether he is right or wrong.

auth_sentence.content: Regularly liaise with project leads to determine project status.
auth_sentence.res_content: Regularly liaise with project leads to determine project status.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Regularly liaise with project leads to determine project status.

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结

Sentence.sentence: The team conducted a computer-based analysis to determine the impact a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt intake on rates of heart disease and death.

In the absence of societal pressures to maintain pair-bonds, O'Sullivan suggests that romantic love has increasingly come to be seen as the factor that should determine who we stay with and for how long
Our food intake is determined by our biological needs.
minister of social security, quickly commissioned a study to determine the causes of and possible cures for this disturbing stale of affairs.

My colleagues and I are studying something called augmented reality (a field of computer research dealing with the combination of real-world and virtual reality)," said Christopher Dede, professor in learning technologies at Harvard University, "Alien Contact," for example, is an exercise developed for middle-school students who use hand-held devices that can determine their location.
The aim is to ensure that employees have an explicit tool to help them understand their own abilities and aspirations, determine career possibilities, and set (usually short-ter goals.

sentences.cn: 董事会决定公司的方针。

sentences.en: He has determined to give up smoking.
Have they determined when to start?
sentences.cn: 他们决定什么时候动身了吗?

sentences.en: The news that he was in trouble determined me to act at once.
sentences.cn: 他陷入困境的消息使我决心立即行动。

sentences.en: We both looked up to determine the source of the water.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都向上看, 以便确定水从何处流下来。

sentences.en: Shall we determine what we are going to do next?
sentences.cn: 我们来确定一下下一步该做什么吧?

sentences.en: I determine him to be a fool.

means.word_mean: 限定; 制定; 支配

sentences.en: Economic factors determine the progress which a society can make.
sentences.cn: 经济因素是社会进步的决定因素。

means.word_mean: 最后解决(争端、争执、问题等)；决定

sentences.en: He determined that he would travel to New York this summer holiday.
sentences.cn: 他决定今年暑假将旅行到纽约。

means.word_mean: 给…以明确的目标，指明(方向)，决定…的方向；使有倾向性，促成，促使

sentences.en: They must determine where the conference will take place.
sentences.cn: 他们必须决定在哪里召开会议。

sentences.en: His encouragement determined us to carry on with the study.
sentences.cn: 他的鼓励使我们决心继续学下去。

jushi.english: He has not yet fully determined.
jushi.chinese: 他还没有完全下定决心。
董事会决定公司的方针大计。
